participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

CCDQME_01.LongName: How many years (months) have you practiced meditation?

CCDQME_02a.LongName: Do you practice meditation on a regular basis (daily/weekly)? Y/N

CCDQME_03.LongName: Specify the different types of meditation that you have been practicing?

CCDQME_04.LongName: Do you currently practice or have you recently participated in organized meditation training classes or clubs? Y/N

CCDQME_05.LongName: For how long have you participated in organized meditation training clases or clubs or how long ago did you practice in an organized meditation training class or club? (months/weeks)

CCDQME_06.LongName: Have you previously participated in any meditation retreats? Y/N

CCDQME_06a.LongName: How long ago was the most recent retreat you participated in?

CCDQME_07.LongName: On a scale of 1 to 10, with 1 being complete novice and 10 being expert, please rate your meditation skill level.
